ygData.subject: Re: Fw: I have quit Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: Me have one thing to say EQ is fun if u dunt camp for items like me everyday kill go diff places sumtimes sick of sol b go guk sick of guk go karanas still
ygData.messageBody:
Me have one thing to say EQ is fun if u dunt camp for items like me everyday kill go
diff places sumtimes sick of sol b go guk sick of guk go karanas still sick go spam
guildsay =), bottomline is dunt everyday log on think of i want to camp this i was
to camp that. i stopped lvling to wait for ppl like fesse,DF,FF,Galarion, Kailligan
to catch up then can organise guild trip to places heck if all 50 fesse can show us
POF somemore ppl in innoruk are idiots like merlain who like to kamikaze in POF so
much. So take my advice take some time off lvling do some fun things like recently
guild trip to WK ogres we managed to PL bibi and kell and got some nice stuff for
ourselves =). Like fesse tell me item not impt having fun with the game is.

Merns , 41 wiz and guild Taxi =( (Ziltus Leshrec come back!)

Sereph wrote:

> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> Don't you think this is a bit rashed? I chao chao also have endure EQ for nearly
> 2 years now and stil manage to tahan the camping etc..... by NOT camping for
> items unless friends are camping or if soloing for XP, spam guildsay or talk
> cock with other people.
>
> They way with EQ is as you say level level level then at 50 camp items blah blah
> blah, but you can do other things like run around the various karana plains and
> admire the sight or enter a low level dungeon and help newbies survive, else if
> you everday camp item also can go gila.
>
> You can also do the long boring quest that eq has, heck, if you want to kill
> Lucan, just send a tell and I help take 1 HT from him before dying......
>
> Else do the most common thing people do when they are sick of EQ, restart! This
> time around, go more slowly, wait for kakis to join up, play a diferent class,
> go to other hunting grounds you have never hunt in before. This will make it
> slightly more enjoyable and is a good chance to meet up with new people.
>
> The over level 30 population in Inno is now at at all time low with you
> leaving....... Once either Zan, FF or Merns leave, I better pack up and zhao as
> well.....
>
> Bottomline, get your arse back into EQ and slave with the rest of us........ and
> if you do return, don't play for so long, play for shorter periods and forcus
> more of fun and interaction.
>
> Fesse Estasis, Cleric who is working on her KOS faction.
>
> Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:
>
> > From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 17:26
> > Subject: I have quit Everquest
> >
> > > Hi all,
> > > Dued to my failure at PoF which got alot of ppl into trouble
> > (which
> > > involved dying and losing the major portion of their stuff) and with
> > little
> > > else to do (except like camping for stuff, which I have gotten very sick
> > and
> > > tired of), I have cancelled my account as from today, Oct 26th 1999. Zand,
> > > please give out the items to the people as I have listed down with you.
> > > Especially Weadaenye, whom I'm guilty as hell to got her into a living
> > hell.
> > >
> > > Please help me tell the follow people of my quiting and hope to
> > see
> > > them again sometime on another game another time and Best wishes to them.
> > >
> > > Daedor, Aildiin, Iyenya, Ironbuket, Hoppy, Kitiarra, Stella,
> > > Saintly, Valadine, Millie, Silph, Lunatictiara, Ader, Fost, Sparrow,
> > > Demitry, Wlyven, Anima and Nismo/Volk (they are brothers sharing the same
> > > account).
> > >
> > > Everquest was, had been and enjoyable game at the beginning but
> > due
> > > to the way that the game is designed it reminds me more of Evercamp,
> > > Everbitch etc etc. It has become a torture to enter the "game" each day
> > now.
> > > This incident has at least freed me from Evercrack as some would say it
> > is.
> > > So farewell my fellow guildmates. And may your time in Everquest be as
> > your
> > > first day, with new and exciting adventures each day.
> > >
> > > Garren The Broken Paladin.
> > >
> >
> > > Singapore Everquest Players List
>
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
